statements: SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT location, ethnicity FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT patient_id, gender, income FROM patient_demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender ASC
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE income BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, age, ethnicity FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, ethnicity, location FROM patient_demographics WHERE income < 40000 ORDER BY location, ethnicity
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, gender, insurance_status FROM patient_demographics WHERE zip_code = '90210';
SELECT service_name, average_cost FROM healthcare_services WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY average_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'F' AND insurance_status = 'Private';
SELECT service_name, service_category FROM healthcare_services WHERE average_cost BETWEEN 100.00 AND 500.00 ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, insurance_status FROM patient_demographics WHERE zip_code = '12345'
SELECT service_name, average_cost FROM healthcare_services WHERE service_category = 'Surgery' AND availability = TRUE ORDER BY average_cost ASC
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' OR age < 25
SELECT service_name, service_category, availability FROM healthcare_services WHERE average_cost > 1000 AND availability = FALSE
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE race='White';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE facility_type='Hospital';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_type FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT race) AS distinct_races FROM patients;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM healthcare_facilities LEFT JOIN appointments ON healthcare_facilities.facility_id = appointments.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT patient_id, gender, ethnicity FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT facility_name, appointment_date FROM healthcare_facilities JOIN appointments ON healthcare_facilities.facility_id = appointments.facility_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name,age,address FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE facility_type='Hospital';
SELECT patient_name,age,address FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender='Female';

SELECT pd.patient_name,sa.service_name,sa.start_date,sa.end_date FROM patient_demographics pd INNER JOIN service_usage su ON pd.patient_id = su.patient_id INNER JOIN services_available sa ON su.service_id = sa.service_id ORDER BY sa.start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT service_name, start_date, end_date FROM services_available WHERE end_date >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, s.service_name, su.checkin_time, su.checkout_time FROM service_usage su JOIN patient_demographics p ON su.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN services_available s ON su.service_id = s.service_id ORDER BY su.checkin_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT DISTINCT ethnicity FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, rating FROM facilities WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT facility_name, location, rating FROM facilities ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT physician_id, first_name, last_name, specialty, years_of_experience FROM physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, appointments.appointment_date, physicians.first_name AS doc_first_name, physicians.last_name AS doc_last_name FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN physicians ON appointments.physician_id = physicians.physician_id;
